Headline: Green Line Delays, No Service Between Garfield & Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: Green Line service experiencing delays; limited service via train shuttle available btwn Cottage Grove & Ashland/63rd

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are experiencing delays due to a shortage of available staff. We are working to run as much service as frequently and as evenly as possible.

Currently, trains are operating in one section:

  • between Harlem/Lake and Ashland/63rd

Shuttle trains are available at Ashland/63rd and Cottage Grove/63rd to provide connecting service.

Change trains at Ashland for continuing service between the East 63rd branch and trains running the remainder of the Green Line route between Harlem/Lake, downtown and Ashland/63rd.

See station personnel for further assistance and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
